name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share Current Page - Web Share API

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly share the current page’s URL using the Web Share API. Ideal for sharing links with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Share Current Page is a lightweight Chrome extension that enables you to share the URL of the page you’re currently visiting with just one click. It leverages the Web Share API to open your browser’s native sharing dialog, allowing you to send links via email, messaging apps, or other platforms.

Features:
	•	Share any webpage with one click.
	•	Uses the browser’s native sharing interface for simplicity.
	•	Compatible with Web Share API-supported devices.

This extension is ideal for users who frequently share links with colleagues, friends, or family. Easy to use and no setup required—simply click the extension icon to start sharing!

Notes:
	•	Works best on mobile devices and Web Share API-compatible browsers.
	•	Desktop sharing options may vary depending on your browser and operating system.”
